      • DISPLAYTEST

        public static final ExtensionPoint<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String>,java.util.function.BiPredicate<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean>>> DISPLAYTEST
        Compatibility display test for the mod. Used for displaying compatibility with remote servers with the same mod, and on disk saves. The supplier provides my "local" version for sending across the network or writing to disk The predicate tests the version from a remote instance or save for acceptability (Boolean is true for network, false for local save)
